title: GET_PED_SOURCE_OF_DEATH
content:
0x84ADF9EB// GetPedSourceOfDeath
Entity GET_PED_SOURCE_OF_DEATH(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: The entity id. Returns 0 if the ped has no killer.Get the entity that killed the ped. This native is used server side when using OneSync.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_SOURCE_OF_DEATH
GetPedSourceOfDeath(ped)
